place_description: Local bookstore providing a curated selection of romance-only titles.

reviews_data.review_text: Super cute romance bookstore we visited on our trip. The selection is awesome and ranges from Fantasy and Contemporary to Smut . Employees were friendly and helpful. There is only 2 things I would want others to know: the parking is not great. I'm not sure if we went at a busier time than normal but had to park in front of someone's house down the street. And they are a cashless business so be sure to have a debit/credit card handy! All in all, great little shop with a great selection!

I've been here probably 5+ times since they opened March 1st-2nd. I absolutely loved this shop. I always had a good experience until yesterday. My fiance was with me for the first time during this visit. He always ask a lot of random questions when he's fascinated about something. He was admiring the shop. We were there the last hour before closing. One member of the staff, was a little rude to us and made us feel like she was annoyed of us during my checkout because my fiance asked a random question. The owner, who is ALWAYS amazing to me, wasn't there. I've been feeling a little bothered about the interaction with the staff since. I asked my fiance if he felt the same or if I was just crazy, and he agreed that he felt like she was rude.
What a great new indie bookstore!
Highly recommend for any romance book fans. The atmosphere is lovely and all the people were so amazing and friendly! I can't wait for my next trip!
Super cute shop! Workers are very friendly and we exchanged book recs and made my tbr even longer lol. Love the dark moody theme of the inside and cute little photo opps

I arrived as soon as they opened on a Saturday and it is very cute! My friend and I drove an hour to go and was so welcoming and we enjoyed all the little details of the store! I recommend my friends to go!
Very friendly staff and such a cute store. Very nice selection and cute bookish accessories.

I am participating in the Greater Charlotte book crawl this year. If you happen to be a student at the CPCC Central campus, it is only eight minutes away. Bear in mind that there is little to no parking at this location. There is literally only 5 parking spots and one handicap spot out of the 5 parking spots available. It is a quaint, but cozy space filled with books and everything is well labeled.There is shelves dedicated to various romance subgenres. There is Dark romance, Fantasy romance, Monster romance, Mafia romance etc. The people tending to the store were super friendly, and I asked what the process is for local authors to have their book in the store. They highly recommend emailing them, and you will discuss with the owner where to go from there. I love this store and I would definitely go back
Super cute!
So excited to have a romance book shop in Charlotte ! Iv shopped at the trope bus many times and it's amazing to see a small business owner expand .
Have loved Trope since she was chugging along just as the Green Girl - so happy to have a permanent spot to explore all the book goodies!!

Gorgeous atmosphere, comfortable vibes, sweet staff and an overwhelmingly positive experience! 
Visited with friends for my birthday and dressed up just for this trip! We've all seen the Trope Bookshop online and were super excited to check it out! We all bought books and read them together!
Hope to see the community continue to grow and uplift authors of all kind. It's great to find inclusive spaces in Charlotte! I look forward to checking out their book club and other events!
I adore this new bookshop! Everything is so organized and has a moody vibe. #romanceonly

If I had to sum it up in one word, it would be "timeless." The bookstore is pristine, yet it has the feel of a place that's always been there--like the bookstore of your dreams, complete with a rolling ladder. Every single detail was perfectly thought out.
I can't wait to make so many memories here!

I had to leave and come back on my first visit. When I went in, there was a group of people dressed as unicorns? They were bumping into people and yelling across the store. I know the staff and owners can't do much about it, but it would've been nice if it was more calm. Maybe they could've asked them to be more mindful of others? I waited in my car until they left and went back in.
I didn't feel super welcome and when I was trying to talk to the staff member, she was on her phone and didn't seem interested in her customers.
Besides that, I like the vibe but I do think the social media posts portray it differently.
Maybe I'll come back and give it another try.

10/10 best local book store, and she's woman owned?  Say less!  The best range of books a girl could ask for, Romantasy, dark romance, contemporary, and LGBTQ+ friendly??  Heck yea!  I could spend all day, every day and still find new books to take home!  If you haven't come here, you're missing out.

Katie is making space for anyone who loves romance and banned books. Every time I'm in the shop I get to yap about the things that spark joy in this dumpster-fire of a world we live in. Stay smutty! Xoxo
Cute shop, not a great sapphic selection, staff member seemed a bit rude when asked about the sapphic selection. I don't want to assume staff is homophobic towards wlw, but their attitude seemed off.

loved this bookstore, went with my book club friends and we did share a similar experience. The people that work there could be a bit more welcoming/nicer to POC. They were NOT rude but there was definitely something off. Other than that, it is a tight space but beautiful. I would go to my local B&N before coming back here.
Absolutely adorable book shop! Friendly staff and such a cool selection!

So I'm a big fan of reading and I have always enjoyed it. Some of my best friends are published authors and I get a real thrill out of proof or beta reading a new manuscript before it is refined and polished. How does that relate to this newly opened, woman owned, brick and mortar shop here in Central Charlotte you might ask? Well the answer is quite simple before you can get lost in a book, you first must find it. At the Trope Bookstore they have an excellent selection of One Genre. A specialized bookstore if you will. I mean I shop at specialized shops all the time, so why not go to a curated place where the staff are extremely knowledgeable on practically every book on the shelves!
I don't know why you're still reading this when you should be reading the spines of the books at Trope! Get going!!
By the way I'd like to mention this one book I saw, and I'm pretty sure no one knows quite what the contents of it are supposed to be? "You're A Violent Little Thing Aren't' You"
Go find it!
What Katie and crew has built it nothing short of amazing! Will be doing all of my book buying here from now on

Super cute Niche Bookshop. The workers were VERY helpful and knowledgeable about the books. They were selling out so quick, I will absolutely be planning to go back after they stock up from their opening weekend!
The happiest place on earth! Can't wait to go back!
A MUST visit!!!! I wish I could give six stars
Amazing store and people. So welcoming. Loved getting to experience opening day and hang out with like minded book folk and find my new go to store for my favorite genre!

Such an amazing spot !! If you're looking for a book store with the perfect mix of ambience and amazing selection of romance books this is it ! It's a must see in CLT ! Perfectly laid out and easy to browse what's available and such a cute inside ! #YeahRomanceOnly

The. Best. Bookshop. Ever.
I've been to the green bus once and fell in love with it! It has a great selection of romance books from fantasy to young adult. I also love how her store highlights local authors too! It is very organized, very cute inside and the employees are beyond friendly. This has become my new favorite bookstore and I am so excited for what's in store for it!!
Pure joy! An absolutely gorgeous romance only bookshop with a diverse selection!
A romance only bookstore yay!! The space is so warm and inviting. It's categorized so nicely including a banned book section and a local authors section. Love every detail of the store!
Seriously the most gorgeous bookstore I've ever been in! Charlotte needed something like this for all of us romance book loving girlies!
Trope is an AMAZING bookstore! It has very dark, romantic moody vibes. Definitely a great spot for the girlies, especially supporting women owned!
